snippet: Mr. Beals, whose youthful voice resulted from a childhood glandular problem, made a long career of playing children and childlike characters on television shows and commercials.
abstract: Dick Beals, veteran voice-over actor, dies at age 85.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Beals, whose youthful voice resulted from a childhood glandular problem, made a long career of playing children and childlike characters on television shows and commercials.

headline.seo: Dick Beals, 85, Who Gave a Voice to Gumby, Dies
headline.main: Dick Beals, Actor Who Gave a Voice to Gumby and Speedy, Is Dead at 85
headline.print_headline: Dick Beals, 85, Actor Who Gave a Voice to Gumby and Speedy
